noise: Microsoft has launched "Copilot for Regulated Cloud," introducing enhanced data residency options and granular administrative controls for M365 Copilot in EU regulated sectors.
translation: Forget sending sensitive client data to the US for AI processing. Your existing M365 subscription likely now offers Copilot with EU data residency, making compliance easier. This isn't magic; it means you can finally start using AI for real work without GDPR nightmares, but only if you set it up right.
action: I can audit your M365 setup and implement Copilot's new EU-compliant features for your firm
